reviewText: I am happy with this order.

this movie was pretty good for what it is. I thought the story was good, the acting was good especialy the man who played santa clause. all in all this is a good movie for the family to enjoy. if you have not seen this movie then I recommend you do

If you purchased Santa's Summer House (released in 2013), then you don't need to purchase this movie. They're one in the same, just different names. I can only assume that the studio didn't make enough on the first release and are hoping to recover more funds under a different title, different year. The movie is ok: some decent laughs, predictable problems, quick solutions. I can't say it will be an every Christmas viewing but I'll have it on the shelf just in case.Action Star Christmas
